article.title: Boeing to Develop Logistics Infrastructure for Space Based Surveillance
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Boeing Company, Seal Beach, California, is being awarded a $23,881,830 cost-plus-award-fee contract option for calendar year 2012 maintenance and operations services to provide the requirements for the development and delivery of the logistics infrastructure for the Space Based Space Surveillance Block 10 System.Â U.S. Air Force Space and Missile Systems Center, El Segundo, California, is the contracting activity.
